DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if exercise training with or without testosterone replacement can improve cardiopathy in heart failure patients
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training and Testosterone Replacement in Heart Failure Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In this study, we are evaluating: - hospital length of stay and readmission - muscle sympathetic nerve activity - functional capacity - body composition
DOC.criteria: heart failure hypogonadism left ventricular fraction ejection < 45% chronic renal failure normal testosterone pace maker
